GV05garbhupu:0: Garbhopaniṣat oṃ pañcātmakaṃ pañcasu vartamānaṃ ṣaḍāśrayaṃ ṣaḍguṇayogayuktam /
GV05garbhupu:1: taṃ saptadhātuṃ trimalaṃ dviyoniṃ caturvidhāhāramayaṃ śarīram || GarUp_1
GV05garbhupu:2: pañcātmakam iti kasmāt pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśam ity asmin pañcātmake śarīre kā pṛthivī kā āpaḥ kiṃ tejaḥ ko vāyuḥ kim ākāśam /
GV05garbhupu:3: tatra pañcātmake śarīre yat kaṭhinaṃ sā pṛthivī yad dravaṃ tā āpaḥ yad uṣṇaṃ tat tejaḥ yat saṃcarati sa vāyuḥ yac chuṣiraṃ tad ākāśam /
GV05garbhupu:4: tatra pṛthivī dhāraṇe āpaḥ piṇḍīkaraṇe tejaḥ prakāśane vāyur vyūhane ākāśam avakāśapradāne
GV05garbhupu:5: pṛthak śrotre śabdopalabdhau tvak sparśe cakṣuṣī rūpe jihvā rasane nāsikā ghrāṇe upastha ānandane apānam utsarge buddhyā budhyati manasā saṃkalpayati vācā vadati /
GV05garbhupu:7: saptadhātukam iti kasmāt śuklo raktaḥ kṛṣṇo dhūmraḥ pītaḥ kapilaḥ pāṇḍura iti /
GV05garbhupu:9_0: parasparaṃ saumyaguṇatvāt ṣaḍvidho rasaḥ rasāc choṇitaṃ śoṇitān māṃsaṃ māṃsān medo
GV05garbhupu:9_1: medasaḥ snāyavaḥ snāyubhyo 'sthīni asthibhyo majjā majjātaḥ śukraṃ śukraśoṇitasaṃyogād
GV05garbhupu:9_2: āvartate garbho hṛdi vyavasthāṃ nayati hṛdaye 'ntar
GV05garbhupu:10: āgniḥ agnisthāne pittaṃ pittasthāne vāyuḥ vāyuto hṛdayaṃ prājāpatyāt kramāt || GarUp_3
GV05garbhupu:11_0: ṛtukāle samprayogād ekarātroṣitaṃ kalalaṃ bhavati saptarātroṣitaṃ budbudam ardhamāsābhyantare
GV05garbhupu:11_1: piṇḍaṃ māsābhyantare kaṭhinaṃ māsadvayena śiraḥ māsatrayeṇa pādapradeśaḥ caturthe
GV05garbhupu:11_2: gulphajaṭharakaṭipradeśāḥ pañcame pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ ṣaṣṭhe mukhanāsikākṣiśrotrāṇi saptame
GV05garbhupu:11_3: jīvena saṃyuktaḥ aṣṭame sarvalakṣaṇasampūrṇaḥ pitū reto'tirekāt puruṣaḥ mātū reto'tirekāt
GV05garbhupu:11_4: strī ubhayor vojatulyatvān napaṃusakaṃ vyākulitamanaso 'ndhāḥ khañcāḥ kubjā vāmanā
GV05garbhupu:14: pañcātmakaḥ samarthaḥ pañcātmikā cetasā buddhir gandharasādijñānākṣarākṣaram oṃkāraṃ cintayatīti tad ekākṣaraṃ jñātvāṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ śarīre tasyaiva dehinaḥ /
GV05garbhupu:16: atha navame māsi sarvalakṣaṇajñānasampūrṇo bhavati pūrvajātiṃ smarati śubhāśubhaṃ ca karma vindati || GarUp_4
GV05garbhupu:18: āhārā vividhā bhuktāḥ pītā nānāvidhāḥ stanāḥ /
GV05garbhupu:19: jātaś caiva mṛtaś caiva janma caiva punaḥ punaḥ || GarUp_5
GV05garbhupu:20: yan mayā parijanasyārthe kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham /
GV05garbhupu:21: ekākī tena dahye 'haṃ gatās te phalabhoginaḥ || GarUp_6
GV05garbhupu:22: aho duḥkhodadhau magno na paśyāmi pratikriyām /
GV05garbhupu:23: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye maheśvaram || GarUp_7
GV05garbhupu:25: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye nārāyaṇam || GarUp_8
GV05garbhupu:27: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat sāṃkhyaṃ yogam abhyase || GarUp_9
GV05garbhupu:29: yadi yonyāḥ pramuñcāmi dhyāye brahma sanātanam || GarUp_10
GV05garbhupu:30: atha yonidvāraṃ samprāpto yantreṇāpīḍyamāno mahatā duḥkhena jātamātras tu vaiṣṇavena vāyunā saṃspṛṣṭas tadā na smarati janma maraṇāni na ca karma śubhāśubhaṃ vindati || GarUp_11
GV05garbhupu:31: śarīram iti kasmāt agnayo hy atra śriyante jñānāgnir darśanāgniḥ koṣṭhāgnir iti tatra koṣṭhāgnir nāmāśitapītalehyacoṣyaṃ pacati /
GV05garbhupu:34_0: trīṇi sthānāni bhavanti mukhe āhavanīya udare gārhapatyo hṛdi dakṣiṇāgniḥ ātmā yajamāno
GV05garbhupu:34_1: mano brahmā lobhādayaḥ paśavo dhṛtir dīkṣā saṃtoṣaś ca buddhīndriyāṇi yajñapātrāṇi
GV05garbhupu:34_2: karmendriyāṇi havīṃṣi śiraḥ kapālaṃ keśā darbhāḥ mukham antarvediḥ catuṣkapālaṃ śiraḥ
GV05garbhupu:34_3: ṣoḍaśa pārśvadantapaṭalāni saptottaraṃ marmaśataṃ sāśītikaṃ saṃdhiśataṃ sanavakaṃ
GV05garbhupu:34_4: snāyuśataṃ sapta sirāśatāni pañca majjāśatāni asthīni ca ha vai trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭiḥ
GV05garbhupu:34_5: sārdhacatasro romāṇi koṭyo hṛdayaṃ palāny aṣṭau dvādaśa palā jihvā pittaprasthaṃ
GV05garbhupu:34_6: kaphasyāḍhakaṃ śukrakuḍavaṃ medaḥ prasthau dvāv aniyataṃ mūtrapurīṣam āhāraparimāṇāt /
GV05garbhupu:35: paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstraṃ paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstram iti || GarUp_12
